Title: Authorizes the commissioner of transportation to conduct a study relating to airborne ultrafine particles
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of transportation to conduct a study relating to airborne ultrafine particles; analyzes the impacts of certain large hub commercial airports on airborne ultrafine particles; analyzes the characteristics of such particles; identifies effectiveness of mitigation measures.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of transportation to conduct a study relating to airborne ultrafine particles
